changeSet.sql: update analysis a set type_of_sample_name = ( select description from clinlims.type_of_sample tos, clinlims.sample_item si where tos.id = si.typeosamp_id and si.id = a.sampitem_id ); COMMENT ON COLUMN clinlims.analysis.type_of_sample_name IS 'Used to support arbitrary sample types. Usually from type_of_sample table but may be a dictionary value or a response to ''other''';
